nodes.text: The droid customization kit produced by Ulqib MicroTronics was a tool kit that assisted in the modification of droids. The kit included an extensive set of tools to allow an individual to modify and enhance their droids including a datapad neural pathway linkage, a memory modulator, a memory wipe module, replacement actuators, replacement micro-servos, additional software node, broadband antenna receiver, movement sensor, repulsorlift motor, internal computer interface socket, two photoreceptors, two audio receptors, vocabulator panel, database retrieval system, and a remote programming receiver.
